## Plotly Scatter Plot

```{python}
import plotly.express as px

df['primary_genre'] = df['genres'].str.split(',').str[0].str.strip()

fig = px.scatter(df, x='vote_count', y='vote_average', hover_data=['title'], color='primary_genre', title='Vote Count vs Vote Average')
fig.show()
```

:::
